details: Has applied for a Common Victualler License to be exercised on the above -750SF Ground-floor, takeout-only restaurant includes a customer area, kitchen, back-of-house ware washing and storage areas, a walk-in cooler, and an employee restroom.

Has applied for a Common Victualler License to be exercised on the above -Single-story quick-serve restaurant with a takeout option located in Suite 1000. The interior includes 24 seats on the main floor, a kitchen, and two rear bathrooms. A seasonal private outdoor patio (April through October) offers an additional 12 seats and operates during the same hours as the indoor restaurant.

status_detail: Granted, with a closing hour of 1:00 AM
details: Holder of a Common Victualler License has petitioned to Change the Closing Hour of the licensed business - From: 7:00 AM - 11:00 PM To: 7:00 AM - 3:00 AM.

Holder of an Innholder All-Alcoholic Beverages License has petitioned to change the manager of the licensed business - From: Tarun Shanker To: Fergal Gildea.
Holder of a Club All-Alcoholic Beverages License has petitioned for a change of Officers/Directors.
Holder of an Innholder All-Alcoholic Beverages License has petitioned for a change of Ownership Interest. Secondly, has petitioned for a change of Officers/Directors/LLC Managers.

Lastly, has petitioned to change the manager of the licensed business - From: Christopher Walsh To: Kelly Carillo.

Holder of a Retail Package Store All-Alcoholic Beverages License has petitioned to amend the description of the licensed business - From: 225, 227 Cambridge Street and 361 North Harvard Street, in one room first floor with rear room for stock. To: 225, 227 Cambridge Street and 361 North Harvard Street. The first floor is 8,000 square feet and has two rooms, one of which is for stock. The basement has 3,150 square feet and has two rooms, one which is 3,000 sq. ft and one which is 150 sq.ft. Secondly, has petitioned for a change of Ownership Interest. Thirdly, has petitioned for a change of Officers/Directors/LLC Managers. Lastly, has petitioned to change the manager of the licensed business - From: Jamie Villanueva To: Nam Sam.

dba_name: Bulfinch Social at the Boxer Hotel
details: Holder of an Innholder All-Alcoholic Beverages License has petitioned to transfer the license from the above - To: BM Merrimac Hotel, LLC dba Bulfinch Social at Boxer Hotel (at the same location). Ignacio Casanova Hausmann, Manager. 2:00 AM Closing Hour. Updating the description of premise as follows: In whole of said building for the operation of a full service hotel with 80 guest rooms, with restaurant and lounge on ground floor with bar and approximately 49 seats. All together comprised of 39,100 square feet with 4 entrances and exits.

Holder of a Common Victualler 7 Day All-Alcoholic Beverages License has petitioned to transfer the license from the above - To: F.P. Restaurant, Inc. (with updated stockholders and officers) dba Saraceno/Bella Vista (at the same location). Frank Pezzano, Manager. 1:00 AM Closing Hour. Secondly, has petitioned to amend the description of the licensed premise -From: One room on Basement Level - One room on Street Level and Kitchen - Storage in Basement Level. To: (7200 SF total, 2 entrances, 3 exits) In three floors: (1) basement level, totaling 2400 square feet, in two (2)rooms with 64 seats and 36 seats respectively, office and bathrooms; first floor level, totaling 2400 square feet, in two rooms: the first room with 40 seats, bathroom and kitchen in rear, and the second room with a 12-seat bar and table seating of 20, a second kitchen and bathroom in rear; the second floor level, totaling 2400 square feet, in two rooms, the first room for liquor and sundries storage and the second room for dining with 57 seats.

Holder of a Common Victualler 7 Day Wines and Malt Beverages with Liqueurs License has petitioned to transfer the license and the location - From: Grotto, Inc. located at 37 Bowdoin St, Boston, MA 02114 To: AV 565 Boylston, LLC dba All'Antico Vinaio located at 565 Boylston St, Boston, MA 02116 Justine Zozula, Manager. 1:00 AM Closing Hour. Premises consists of 3,680 square feet on ground floor and basement level. One entrance, two exits. Front entrance on Boylston Street. Dining area with seating for 30 patrons. Kitchen area and prep table to the right center, two bathrooms and refrigerators to the left center. Additional prep area in the rear. Basement for storage. Outdoor patio seating for 12 patrons on private property. Patio is approximately 391 square feet and open seasonally from April 1 to October 31, closing hour same as indoors.

status_detail: Deferred to the August 28 Voting Hearing
details: Has applied for a Retail Package Store Wines and Malt Beverages License to be exercised on the above - 820SF convenience store on 1 floor with 1 entrance/2 exits. No outdoor space.

status_detail: APPLICATION DEADLINE. THE BOARD WILL DEFER DELIBERATION TO CONSIDER
details: Has applied for a Retail Package Store All-Alcoholic Beverages License to be exercised on the above - (Premise located at 543 Commonwealth Ave, 1st Floor) On one floor and containing approximately 1,606 sq ft, contains five rooms. Entrance opens to display room with shelves, cooler, and point of sale. Tasting room to left side of display room. Storage room with exit on rear right side. Dishroom and bathrooms rear left side.

Includes a limited food prep space and is in an area in the Terminal occupied by a number of concessionaires with an adjacent food court seating area where alcohol will be consumed.

business_name: South Bay Fields Pie Company, LLC
status_detail: APPLICATION DEADLINE. THE BOARD WILL DEFER DELIBERATION UNTIL THE
details: Has applied for a Common Victualler (South Bay Restricted) 7 Day All-Alcoholic Beverages License to be exercised on the above  4965 sq. ft. of restaurant space and an additional 967 sq. ft. outdoor patio located on private property, including a bar, kitchen, pizza kitchen, prep space, cooler, office, storage, dining area and bathrooms in Suite #400 on the ground floor of Building D located in the shopping center known as South Bay. The premises contains indoor seating for 138, including 15 at the bar and an additional 48 on the outdoor patio, 2 entrances and 3 exits. Outdoor patio is seasonal, it will operate from May-November and close at 10 pm daily.

Has applied for a Common Victualler 7 Day Wines and Malt Beverages License to be exercised on the above - In one room on first floor with 45 seats, kitchen, storage and bathrooms in rear consisting of 2887 total square feet. (1 entrance, 3 exits).

Has applied for a Common Victualler 7 Day All-Alcoholic Beverages License to be exercised on the above  Premise consists of approximately 1,800 square feet on ground floor and basement (1 entrance, 2 exits). Ground floor main room for dining with seats for 41 patrons. Kitchen rear left, bathrooms rear right. Stairway to basement front left. Basement level dining area with seats for 26 patrons. Prep kitchen and exit in rear.
